metadata.title: CVE-2018-20067 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A renderer initiated back navigation was incorrectly allowed to cancel abrowser initiated one in Navigation in Google Chrome prior to 71.0.3578.80allowed a remote attacker to confuse the user about the origin of thecurrent page via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
